content: anish | IIT Palakkad Englishहिन्दी A- A A+ 0491 209 2013 (Office) | info@iitpkd.ac.in INDIAN INSTITUTE OF TECHNOLOGY PALAKKAD Kanjikode | Palakkad | Kerala - 678623 0491 209 2001 (Office) | info@iitpkd.ac.in Dr. Anish HirweAssistant ProfessorComputer Science And EngineeringResearch Area: "Computer Networks, Distributed Systems, Security"View Website Biosketch Anish Hirwe is an Assistant Professor in the Department of Computer Science and Engineering at Indian Institute of Technology Palakkad (Jan 2023 onward). My key research interest is in the intersection of Computer Systems, Networks and Security. Current Focus I am actively working on research problems related to: High-performance networking and observability Programmable data planes and custom network behavior Container security Network telemetry in distributed systems for fine-grained monitoring and diagnostics Current Research Students Krishnaveni K S (PhD) Chikkala Kiran Babu  (PhD) Arishmita Biswas (MS) Formar Students B.Tech Anusha Chapati Laasya Priya Chitturi Priyanshu Vishnu Nair Yukta Salunkhe (Accenture Japan) Mangesh Dalvi (MoneyForward Japan) Shubhang Kedia (Sprinklr) Sahil (Sprinklr) M.Tech David Shepherd Chintala Aniket Nargotra Bio: Education PhD from Dept. of Computer Science and Engineering, IIT Hyderabad M.Tech. from Dept. of Computer Science and Engineering, IIT Guwahati B.E. from Dept. of Computer Engineering, Institute of Engineering and Technology, Devi Ahilya University, Indore Research/Teaching experience Assistant Professor, Dept. of Computer Science and Engineering, Mahindra University (Feb 2022- Jan 2023) Research Associate, Dept. of Computer Science and Engineering, IIT Hyderabad (Aug 2021- Jan 2022) Research My key research interest is in the intersection of Computer Systems, Networks and Security.
